ItemDesc: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by 5% plus an additional <unbreak>170</unbreak> ATK increase for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: Made from fermented legume-based products. It smells sour and pungent, but tastes cool and refreshing. If you can drink a big bottle of mung bean soda and remain calm, you will definitely impress the gormandizers on the Luofu. "Like mung beans? Like soda? Then what are you complaining about!?"
